Off Topic問

1. 依家structural牌仲有咩用？香港system on9到civil牌已經可以報哂Struct E post, TCP T5(Structural Stream)同RSE

2.拎個MICE去報MHKIE(Geo)唔駛再考直接pass係唔係偽命題黎？HKIE純粹開條route呃ICE俾MHKIE(Geo)轉得番MICE?

quote.msg:
Off Topic問

1. 依家structural牌仲有咩用？香港system on9到civil牌已經可以報哂Struct E post, TCP T5(Structural Stream)同RSE
